name: Oh My Cod! (AngeLisko)
description:
!!! (The trailer video shows an old and incomplete version of the game) !!!

This is the video game I created for my dissertation project. It still has bugs, but I posted it so I could get some feedback (please!) at this link, it's just 5 questions

---> https://db99qe3s3fq.typeform.com/to/KnmwoxCG

The game was entirely made from scratch, (with the exception of a couple of sprites) all the assets where created using Piskel.com. The music/sound was retrieved from Zapsplat.com. The videos where made using Movavi editor.

STORY:  Oh My Cod! is the name of a fictional fish and chips restaurant in Brighton. Its owner is threatened by an evil hungry seagull, Dart Feather, that wants food delivered to him as soon as possible, or he will continuously defecate on the restaurant and its costumers. Lisko is the owner's granddaughter and it will be her mission to save "Oh My Cod!"  from this evil bird, skating through different places in Brighton.

CONTROLS -> Use arrows keys to move within the level map selection and enter to choose the level to play.  Press "P" to open up the pause menu and check out the controls. Click with mouse cursor on "continue" to read dialogues. Press space bar if you want to skip the videos.
